entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is a person who has been bound by Dumbledore's wand.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who stood up and stared at Barty Crouch with disgust.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a person who was asked by Dumbledore to stand guard.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one that Dumbledore wants to take upstairs.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a person who needs to be called by Snape.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is the one who needs to call Madam Pomfrey.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is a person who needs to be brought up by Severus Snape.

entities.name: alastor moody
entities.description: Alastor Moody is the one who needs to go into the hospital wing.

entities.name: minerva mcgonagall
entities.description: Minerva McGonagall is a title given to Professor McGonagall.

relationships.description: Dumbledore binds Barty Crouch with his wand.
Dumbledore asks Professor McGonagall to stand guard.
Severus Snape brings Cornelius Fudge up to the office.
Dumbledore needs Alastor Moody to go into the hospital wing.
